span_49: One Gustave L. Levy Place, Box 1047
p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_67: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_78: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_96: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_99: The Mount Sinai dermatology residency program is one of the largest in the country. We are lucky enough to be based in the fantastic city of New York, providing an unparalleled diversity of clinical exposure across its various boroughs. We have world-leaders in our faculty, spear-headed by the former President of the AAD Dr. Mark Lebwohl. The program prides itself on its rigorous academic focus, its vast research opportunities and its first class clinical training resources.

p_342: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
